node.title: Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey resigns as shares in company surge
node.alt: Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey in front of a poster of the Twitter bird icon during an address in New Delhi, November 2018.
node.description: Mr Dorsey, who has helmed the social media giant since 2006, has stepped down in a decision that had been coming since last year.
node.content: ["Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey has stepped down from his position, with the company's board unanimously appointing CTO Parag Agrawal as his successor.", "Mr Dorsey posted a statement on his Twitter account, in which he said, \"I want you all to know this was my decision and I own it.\"", "\"I'm really sad ... yet really happy,\" he continued.", "The announcement came hours after being mooted on CNBC and led to shares in the company surging more than\u00a010 per cent in early Tuesday trading.", "More to come.", "Reuters"]
